headline: Ulta Beauty’s Turnaround Plan Is Working. Why One Analyst Still Downgraded the Stock.
summary: Ulta Beauty’s  turnaround plan under new CEO Kecia Steelman is working well.  Loop Capital analyst Anthony Chukumba downgraded Ulta to a Hold from a Buy on Friday, arguing that while the company’s fundamentals remain strong, the stock’s valuation has climbed too much to warrant a Buy rating.  As of Friday morning, Ulta stock was trading at $514.17, above Chukumba’s price target of $510.

headline: Ulta Beauty eyes AI agents amid growth plans
summary: The company is working on the tech foundation to enable adoption, which it hopes will lead to improved employee and customer experiences.
